main event: Multiple UFO sightings over Pigua, Ohio in November 1958 which described oval-shaped, glowing objects moving erratically and leaving trails.
interesting points: The sighting in 1958 described oval-shaped, dirty-white objects, about the size of a dime held at arm's length, which appeared to be rotating and left a trail when they disappeared.
The objects were observed to be climbing and disappearing from sight.
The report includes a questionnaire for witnesses to provide information about the sighting, including details about the appearance, motion, and conditions during the sighting.
Witnesses were asked to draw a picture showing the shape and motion of the object, as well as estimate the size and distance of the object from their location.
The report includes a typed message detailing the characteristics and movement of the observed objects, as well as the date, time, and security classification of the report.
